scripts.test:functions: cd functions && TEST=Y && PRIMARY_USER_EMAIL=primary@example.com && coverage run -m unittest && coverage lcov && coverage html && cd ..
scripts.test:firestore: npx firebase emulators:exec --only auth,functions,firestore 'npm run test:data && node test/firestore/test_rules.js'
scripts.test: npm run test:functions && npm run test:firestore && npm run test:ui
scripts.start: npx firebase emulators:exec --only auth,functions,firestore,storage --ui 'npm run test:data && fvm flutter run -d chrome --web-port=3000'
